'''Linden Wood "Sturdy" Bunk''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Linden Wood "Sturdy" Bunk is obtainable from the [[Rag and Bone Shop]], [[Fortress of Meropide]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
